description: AbstractOccupiedSpace is the abstract superclass for all types of physically occupied spaces. Occupied space refers to spaces that are partially or entirely filled with matter.

properties.name: lod1ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the occupied space in Level of Detail 1.

properties.name: lod2ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the occupied space in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod3ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the occupied space in Level of Detail 3.
